name: Overcoming Fears
description:
Overcoming Fears is a turn-based puzzle game set in the spooky land of dreams.

Help Max to explore the Magic Castle, facing bizarre enemies, escaping deadly traps and finding the horrific truth behind his nightmare.
Live a dark fairy tail that will test your mind and will enchant your eyes. Look around you and put back together all the pieces to discover Max’s story

Experience a dream journey in a world with captivating visual and creepy soundtrack.
Face Max’s deepest fears with a lot of intriguing puzzles. Fight toy-enemies and survive to the dark magic of the castle.
